metadata.title: CVE-2020-13848 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Portable UPnP SDK (aka libupnp) 1.12.1 and earlier allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted SSDP message due to aNULL pointer dereference in the functions FindServiceControlURLPath andFindServiceEventURLPath in genlib/service_table/service_table.c.

criterions.comment: libupnp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
